artist: Artist: Attributed to Sebastiano del Piombo
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: Recto: three studies of a male torso; two in profile and one in 3/4 view; two sketches and one more refined drawing Verso: head of a boar with his mouth open, facing a seated man with his leg under him and his hand slightly behind him with his head thrown back
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
title: Three Studies of An Antique Statue of Marsyas (recto); Wild Boar Attacking a Fallen Hunter Dressed in a Chiton (verso)
